review: It works perfectly as it is supposed to. My family has come to use the Chromecast to stream from youtube and netflix using the smart phones as a much more user friendly and convenient interface.

review: There's no reason to get this if you have a modern game console, bluray player, or computer connected to your TV already.  Lack of IR remote control input frustrates usage and control.  Poor Chrome screen mirroring.

review: Great product. The Google Chromecast works well, with no problems. I wish there were more things to screen, but rumor has it that more are soon to come.
